name: Uta no * Prince-Sama: Amazing Aria
overview: Nanami Haruka has found her partner and the voice to bring her compositions to life. Yet challenges just don't stop there. To pass the exams, she has to win the graduation auditions with her partner. When emotions get into music, they may make the melody sweeter, but couple fights could stump your work in progress. Learn to deal with the princes as a girlfriend and combine all aspects of romance into your songs. Amazing Aria has new characters for you to date. If you were really successful in the first game, load your data into the new game to push your love gauge to a new max. Be sure, too, to enjoy the new music and the new event illustrations.
